Class LatticeFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame

                  • org.opensourcephysics.frames.LatticeFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppFrame, Hidable

    public class LatticeFrame
extends DrawingFrame
    A DrawingFrame that displays plots using a Lattice.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
